name: CopySettingsTool
title: Copy Settings Tool (area selection tool for copy-once/paste-multiple)
title_original: Copy Settings Tool (area selection tool for copy-once/paste-multiple)
author: BinbinHfr
description: This area selection tool is an extension of the classical copy-paste settings feature, that allows multiple paste on a group of objects.
description_original: This area selection tool is an extension of the classical copy-paste settings feature, that allows multiple paste on a group of objects.
